questions.question: These two brothers are brilliant alchemists searching for knowledge of the Philosopher's Stone.
At the end of this anime's episodes, the main characters' dog sings a tale of woe.
In this mindbending anime, a girl in a bear suit becomes God of the Internet.
In this ultraviolent anime, the entire cast kills each other every few episodes before time is reset.
In this anime, a brilliant hacker helps those in need, being paid for his good deeds with trinkets.
